meanings.definition: Mbaqangas: a type of South African bread
meanings.sent1: I bought some delicious mbaqangas from the bakery.
meanings.sent2: The mbaqangas were freshly baked and smelled amazing.
meanings.sent3: The mbaqangas were so fluffy, they almost looked like clouds.
meanings.sent4: The warm mbaqangas melted in my mouth like butter.
meanings.sent5: The mbaqangas were the highlight of the meal, everyone loved them.

meanings.definition: Mbaqangas: the plural form of mbaqanga, a style of South African music
meanings.sent1: The band played lively mbaqangas that got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to traditional mbaqangas on the radio.
meanings.sent3: The mbaqangas had such a catchy beat, I couldn't stop tapping my foot.
meanings.sent4: The mbaqangas filled the air with rhythm and joy.
meanings.sent5: The mbaqangas transported me to a lively South African celebration.
